[event]
# Teleport to Laurelia
type=event
location=18,12,2,1
activate=on_trigger
intermap=maps/laurelia.txt,69,59

[event]
# Fireplace
type=event
location=18,4,2,1
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
intermap=maps/basement1.txt,13,30
msg=A secret passage!
requires_status=ghosttalis
set_status=explorebasement
